CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 2, 1954, pg. 9, reads: " KOLESQUES DONATE TO BELVEDERE - Miss Jeanne Holland and Mrs. Rebecca Armstrong (far right), president of the Kolesque Club, are shown as they presented Sister Petrie with a $100 donation check for Belverdere [sic] Hospital this week as proceeds from charity affairs given by the young women's group. Other members, not shown, are Janice Dent, Margaret Woods, Deniese [Denise] McGuire, Delores Golden, Kathleen Douglass, Beatrice Harris, Geraldine Gilbert, Delores Anderson, Audrey McDaniels, Odell King, Joan Gainer, Germaine Moore, Joan Bruce and Adelaide McGranery. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Sister Petrie, Jeanne Holland, and Rebecca "Becky" Armstrong holding check, for donation to Belvedere Hospital from Kolesque Club
